TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit DeploymentDownloadException extends System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException

summary.span: Indicates that there was an error downloading either the ClickOnce manifests or the deployment's files to the client computer.

span.span: Indicates that there was an error downloading either the ClickOnce manifests or the deployment's files to the client computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以表示许多问题发生时用户已尝试下载[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序更新：A can indicate that a number of problems occurred when the user tried to download a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application update: - 客户端的计算机的网络连接已关闭。The client's computer's network connection is down. - Web 服务器、 FTP 服务器或承载更新文件共享不可用。The Web server, FTP server, or file share hosting the update is unavailable. - 一个或多个中的文件[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]找不到部署。One or more of the files in the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment was not found. 若要获取有关异常的错误详细的信息，请查阅[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]错误日志。To obtain detailed error information about an exception, consult the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] error log. 有关详细信息，请参阅[排查 ClickOnce 部署](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58e90012-f68b-4852-8ae9-58e361cbcc32)。For more information, see [Troubleshooting ClickOnce Deployments](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58e90012-f68b-4852-8ae9-58e361cbcc32). ## Examples 下面的代码示例以同步方式，安装应用程序更新，并向用户报告，如果没有问题清单或者部署文件下载。The following code example installs an application update synchronously, and reports to the user if there was a problem downloading either the manifests or the deployment's files. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#5)]
